scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:fp
scripts.doc: node lib/main/build-doc github && npm run test:doc
scripts.doc:sitehtml: optional-dev-dependency marky-markdown@^9.0.1 && npm run doc:site && node lib/main/build-site
scripts.style: npm run style:main && npm run style:fp && npm run style:perf && npm run style:test
scripts.test: npm run test:main && npm run test:fp
scripts.validate: npm run style && npm run test
